review: The lesson I need to learn is that you get what you pay for.  $20 too good to be true. Problem 1, Amazon prime is next to worthless for video or music.  Free apps like YouTube and Pandora are better.  Tv? 3 month old cbs news listed as recent? Come on Amazon.  Problem 2., network speed.  Fire will choke your Comcast connection,I guarantee it.  Problem 3,  tv what tv?  Problem 4, internet connections really don't exist.  Don't give up on cable or satellite tv yet.
author: Scott A. Krohn
